Children intervention group expect : 1 ) show willingness try new food , 2 ) show increase self-regulation energy intake . At end intervention , child expect show great consumption fruit vegetable ( include consume wider variety fruit vegetable ) . All effect expect continue 6- 12-month follow-up , although effect sizes diminish . Although expect effect BMI 6 week , expect see decrease child 's BMI percentiles 6- 12-month follow-up intervention groupâ€” especially top 25 % BMI percentile range . No parental BMI effect expect .
